title: Boardwalk Empire
summary: Un homme politique d'Atlantic City dans le New Jersey joue des deux côtés de la loi, conspirant avec des gangsters à l'époque de la prohibition.
anecdotes: Michael Stuhlbarg researched his role as Arnold Rothstein so thoroughly that the show's writers found that he knew more about Rothstein than they did, and they deferred to his judgment of the character.The series never showed most of the numerous large hotel properties that existed in Atlantic City during the 1920s. While this likely due to the cost of doing so even using CGI, it also makes the city look much smaller than it was.James 'Jimmy' Darmody: You can't be half a gangster, Nucky. Not anymore.Featured in The Tonight Show with Jay Leno: Épisode #18.111 (2010)Straight Up and Down(Opening Theme)Written and performed by The Brian Jonestown Massacre

title: Rise of Empires: Ottoman
summary: Le sultan ottoman Mehmet II mène une campagne épique pour prendre la capitale byzantine de Constantinople et façonne le cours de l'histoire pour des siècles.
anecdotes: George Sphrantzes was the Emperor Constantine XI's personal secretary and a friend. According to his own account of the conquest of Constantinople, his daughter Thamar (named Therma in the series) was 12 years old when the city fell and was taken into captivity by the Turks, dying in the Sultan's harem in September 1455 of an infectious disease. Therefore, the series inaccurately portrays her as having escaped to the island of Chios, which was then controlled by Genoa. There is also no evidence that Thamar and Giovanni Giustiniani Longo, the leader of the Genoese mercenaries, were in a romantic relationship.Contemporary accounts do report, on the other hand, that the mortally-wounded Giustiniani was carried off to a Genoese galley which then headed for Chios. Giustiniani died either en route or shortly after arriving on the island and was buried in the Church of San Domenico (later the Church of Santa Maria del Castello, which eventually was converted into a mosque following the Turkish conquest of the island in 1566). The tomb is now lost.
minPicAlt: Cem Yigit Uzümoglu in Rise of Empires: Ottoman (2020)

title: Atlantide, l'empire perdu
summary: Milo James Thatch, un cartographe et linguiste spécialiste en dialectes anciens, travaille sans relâche au sous-sol d'un musée. Comme jadis son grand-père explorateur, il souhaite découvrir ...
anecdotes: (at around 1h 25 mins) Jim Varney (Cookie) died just before finishing the film. The "I ain't so good at speechifying" line near the end is the only line not spoken by Varney. Steven Barr did the voice for that scene.(at around 53 mins) Cookie tells Audrey that he has 'all 38 United States' as a tattoo. In 1914 the United States consisted of 48 states, but Cookie probably got his tattoo years before, maybe when the United States did consist of 38 states - between 1877 and 1890.Vinny: We done a lot of things we're not proud of. Robbing graves, eh, plundering tombs, double parking. But, nobody got hurt. Well, maybe somebody got hurt, but nobody we knew.The Walt Disney Pictures logo is embossed onto steel.On the DVD version, there is an alternate prologue in which Vikings from Iceland attempt to find Atlantis but are destroyed by the Leviathan.Edited into Zenimation: Cityscapes (2020)Where the Dream Takes YouLyrics by Diane WarrenMusic by Diane Warren and James Newton HowardPerformed by MyaMya appears courtesy of A&M Records
minPicAlt: Michael J. Fox in Atlantide, l'empire perdu (2001)

title: Empire
summary: Un magnat du hip-hop doit choisir un successeur parmi ses trois fils qui se battent pour avoir le contrôle de sa société de plusieurs millions de dollars, tandis que son ex-femme tente de ré...
anecdotes: Taraji P. Henson said that she would only do the show under the condition that Terrence Howard played the lead male role.Featured in Late Night with Seth Meyers: Matthew Perry/Taraji P. Henson/Anders Holm (2015)South Side

title: L'Empire contre-attaque
summary: Après que les rebelles soient brutalement maîtrisés par l'Empire sur la planète de glace Hoth, Luke Skywalker commence son entraînement de Jedi avec Yoda, tandis que ses amis sont poursuivis...
anecdotes:
In order to avoid sharing creative rights, George Lucas decided to avoid using a major studio to finance this movie. Instead, he bankrolled the $30 million production himself, using a combination of his profits from Star Wars: Épisode IV - Un nouvel espoir (1977) and a bank loan. Although the move was risky, it paid off several times over. Lucas recovered his investment within three months of the movie's release. He then showed gratitude far beyond the Hollywood norm by sharing the profits with his employees (nearly $5 million in bonuses).Vader kills Captain Needa for losing the Millenium Falcon. When two Imperial soldiers pick up his body to carry away, the corpse steps itself up.Luke: All right, I'll give it a try.Yoda: No. Try not. Do... or do not. There is no try.In the alternate DVD version, the Emperor is still credited as being voiced
by Clive Revill, despite his performance being replaced by Ian McDiarmid.The 1995 THX remastered Pan and Scan VHS release of the 1980 theatrical version has one difference from all other pan and scan releases and the 1992 and 1995 widescreen releases of the same. At the end of the film, the scene simply cuts away to the end credits. All other versions use a wipe to cut away to the end credits.Edited into SP FX: Special Effects - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
minPicAlt: Harrison Ford, Anthony Daniels, Carrie Fisher, Mark Hamill, James Earl Jones, David Prowse, Billy Dee Williams, Kenny Baker, Jeremy Bulloch, and Peter Mayhew in L'Empire contre-attaque (1980)

title: Empire Records
summary: Vingt-quatre heures dans la vie des jeunes employés d'Empire Records. Ils font tous face aux règles strictes du nouveau magasin qu'ils ont rejoint.
anecdotes: Celebrated annually on April 8, Rex Manning Day commemorates the day that washed-up 1980s pop idol Rex Manning (played by Maxwell Caulfield) visited the fictional Empire Records. On a previous Rex Manning Day in 2018, Ethan Embry confirmed the deeper meaning behind the decision for Empire Records to take place on April 8. "The reason we picked April 8th as the day to have Rex Manning visit Empire is because Nirvana frontman, Kurt Cobain, was found on the 8th of April, the day the music of the 1990s lost its mascot," Embry said. Cobain was found dead on April 8, 1994, exactly a year before Empire Records took place.AJ removes his shirt during the close-up in-store dancing scene. The long shot shows it back on, and then another close shot shows it off.Warren: Who glued these quarters down?A.J.: I did.Warren: What the hell for, man?A.J.: I don't feel that I need to explain my art to you, Warren.Mark and Eddie sitting on the curb in front of the store talking about rock bands.Special Edition DVD contains 16 minutes of deleted footage edited back into the film.Featured in WatchMojo: Top 10 Modern Movie Soundtracks Guys Love (2013)Til I Hear It from YouPerformed by Gin BlossomsWritten by Jesse Valenzuela, Robin Wilson and Marshall CrenshawCourtesy of A&M Records Inc.
minPicAlt: Liv Tyler, Renée Zellweger, Robin Tunney, Rory Cochrane, Ethan Embry, and Johnny Whitworth in Empire Records (1995)

title: Empire du soleil
summary: Pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale., un jeune garçon anglais lutte pour survivre sous l'occupation japonaise.
anecdotes: Eric Flynn, who plays a British POW, was actually a POW as a child in a Japanese camp.Jim uses CPR on the dying woman. CPR was developed in 1960.Jim: [during an American airstrike] P-51! Cadillac of the sky!The film title has the "Sun" lit up by the sun. Featured in Siskel & Ebert & the Movies: Wall Street/Throw Momma from the Train/Broadcast News/Empire of the Sun (1987)Suo GanPerformed by The Ambrosian Junior ChoirArranged and conducted by John McCarthySoloist James Rainbird

title: Godzilla x Kong : Le Nouvel Empire
summary: Godzilla et Kong affrontent un monstre terrifiant qui menace la planète entière.
anecdotes: With a net budget of $135 million, this is the cheapest MonsterVerse film to date. The filming process was more streamlined than the previous film, Godzilla vs Kong (2021), which had many extra scenes that were filmed (additional character development, lore expansion, and action scenes) but which were ultimately cut from the final film. Director Adam Wingard also cited more experience with the VFX process.When Godzilla leaves the Roman Colosseum, he knocks down and destroys a large section of its outer walls. When Godzilla returns to the Colosseum later, its walls are intact again.Bernie Hayes: Is that a mini-Kong?The Warner Bros and Legendary Pictures logos are set in the depths of the Hollow Earth, and are made of crystal energy. The WB logo is shaded blue, and the Legendary logo is shaded violet. Featured in WatchMojo: Top 10 Epic Godzilla Team Ups (2023)Welcome To My WorldWritten by John Hathcock and Ray WinklerPerformed by Jim ReevesCourtesy of RCA NashvilleBy arrangement with Sony Music Entertainment
minPicAlt: Godzilla x Kong : Le Nouvel Empire (2024)

title: 300 : La Naissance d'un empire
summary: Le général grec Themistokles est à la tête de l'accusation dirigée contre Xerxès et Artemisia, le commandant vengeur de la marine persane, contre l'invasion des forces perses.
anecdotes: Because of the complicated effects involved in making Xerxes a 10 foot giant, Rodrigo Santoro filmed almost all of his scenes alone in a green-screen room and had little/no interaction with the rest of the cast. He said it was difficult but he got used to it as he had also done it on the first film.The Greek soldier considered the "Hero of Marathon" was Miltiades, not Themistocles. Themistocles was the main General of the Greeks in the Battle of Salamina.[from trailer] Themistocles: Better we show them, we chose to die on our feet, rather than live on our knees!The Warner Bros. and Legendary Pictures logos are seen on doors that open up to reveal the mural of Leonidas and the 300 Spartans.The Indian theatrical release was cut in order to obtain an A (adults only) rating. The sex scene was trimmed.Edited from 300 (2006)War PigsWritten by Ozzy Osbourne (as John Osbourne), Bill Ward (as William Ward), Geezer Butler (as Terence Butler) and Tony IommiPerformed by Black SabbathCourtesy of Downlane Limited
minPicAlt: Sullivan Stapleton in 300 : La Naissance d'un empire (2014)

title: S.O.S. fantômes: La menace de glace
summary: Lorsque la découverte d'un ancien artefact libère une force maléfique, les anciens et les nouveaux S.O.S. Fantômes doivent unir leurs forces pour protéger leur maison et sauver le monde d'un...
anecdotes: In the background at the new facility, the Slime Blowers used in S.O.S. fantômes II (1989) can be seen. One of the engineers is spraying another, perhaps to test the effects of the slime.An ancient artifact has been safely kept in a special brass lined room for decades and there are no issues until it is removed from the room. The main characters are aware of this, but nobody even suggests either returning the artifact to the room or making a brass lined container for the artifact. From what is shown, that should solve the problem.Nadeem Razmaadi: Does anyone have a lighter?Ray Stantz: I quit smoking in the '90s.Peter Venkman: [dryly] Proud of you then, proud of you now.There is a mid-credits scene with a truck driver at a gas station at night.Featured in Jeremy Jahns: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire - Movie Review (2024)Ghostbusters Original ThemesBy Elmer Bernstein
minPicAlt: Paul Rudd, Kevin Mangold, Ian Whyte, Carrie Coon, Mckenna Grace, Finn Wolfhard, and Celeste O'Connor in S.O.S. fantômes: La menace de glace (2024)
